search_terms.title: Search Terms
search_terms.description: Search terms to find products (e.g., 'Silver coin', 'gold eagles'). Each term runs a search on silver.com.

start_urls.title: Start URLs (Optional)
start_urls.description: Optional: specific category or product URLs to scrape directly instead of searching.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of a Silver.com category or product page

max_items.title: Max Items
max_items.description: Maximum number of products to scrape.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxy to use for scraping. Residential proxies are recommended to avoid blocking.
